entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
